info.name: API_Automation Copy
info.description:
# ðŸ“˜ API Automation Test Collection

### ðŸ” Overview

This collection includes automated tests for key API endpoints including cart operations, coupon application, combo validation, order creation, and user profile verification.

### â„¹ï¸ **Pre-requisites:**

- ðŸ“¦ Products should be available to place order (VM 8): 102, 103
    
- ðŸŽŸï¸ Coupons should be available(102)
    
- ðŸ± Combos should be available (601, 905)
    
- ðŸ’° Wallets should be having succefficient balance
    

### ðŸŒ Environments

- `{{base_url}}`: API Base URL
    
- `{{oauthToken}}`: Bearer Token
    
- `{{orderId}}`: Captured after order creation
    

---

request.description:
Fetch coupons appliacable to cart
- filter coupons based on selected vending machine
- filter based on user cart
- filter limit exceeded coupons

response.name:
List of applicable coupons w/ filters applied (i.e. machineId, user cart)
- coupon details
